title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian past a dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Boil the spaghetti until al dente.
Cook the bacon in a skillet until crispy.
Whisk eggs and parmesan in a bowl.
Combine spaghetti, bacon, and egg mixture in the skillet.
Serve with a sprinkle of black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
steps: Marinate the chicken with yogurt and tikka masala spice blend.
Grill the chicken until fully cooked.
Prepare the tomato-based gravy in a pan.
Add the grilled chicken to the gravy and simmer.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with romaine lettuce, parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
ingredients: 1 large head of romaine lettuce, chopped
Salt and black pepper to taste
Optional: Grilled chicken or shrimp (for a protein boost)
steps: Wash and dry the romaine lettuce, then chop it into bite-sized pieces.
In a large salad bowl, toss the lettuce with Caesar dressing until evenly coated.
Add grated parmesan cheese and croutons to the bowl.
Toss the salad gently to combine all the ingredients.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Serve immediately, optionally topped with grilled chicken or shrimp.
